messages.subject: We seriously need Shinsengumi businesscards

messages.messageBody:
come on you guys can come up with better ones (^_^)

http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t270/secretarytocapt3/FGcard.jpg

I was gonna make one for Tokio because I have a reduplicate of
authentic letter head used by the Ministry of Education (the Tokyo
Women's/Womens/Female Normal School used this letterhead as well) but I
may have misplaced by scan.
